name: TVContentIdentifier
desc: An object that uniquely identifies media content in either a single piece or a collection.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The string that identifies this content item.

items.name: var container: TVContentIdentifier?
items.desc: The container that this content item is contained in.
